name: Amonkhet Tile Puzzles (Magic: The Gathering)
description:
A classic sliding tile puzzle game with 8, 15 and 24 tile variants. 

Engage your puzzle brain - try getting a new best time or lowest move count for each puzzle and grid size!

I take no credit for the Magic: The Gathering artwork featured in the puzzles or background. As such, this game is non-commercial only. Full references are contained within the game files.
